::KitKat::

She looked at this bot, "YOur from the council? I have heard of them. 
We need to tell them that Megatron will destroy the ark and kill all 
tranformer life on the planet. He has to be stopped. Or no one will 
survive the time disrutpion that will be caused.  We will simply be 
erased from time."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  "I have heard of this Megatron. He is repellious. My goal is to 
get him 
> stopped. I had been sent by The preadacon council to claim this war 
for a 
> Preadacon victory. But not to disrupt time. Unfortunatly I have 
heard nothing 
> from them since I entered earth. I fear the worst...."
